com.southamptoncodedojo.minesweeper

Class PlayerPlayingGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.southamptoncodedojo.minesweeper.PlayerPlayingGame

  • public class PlayerPlayingGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This encapsulates a Player in a Game

      Constructor and Description
      PlayerPlayingGame(Player player, MapInstance mapInstance) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void completeFirstTurn()
      Complete the first turn - this must be called after takeFirstTurn() and should be called after the map has been generated
      java.lang.String getName() 
      int getTurn() 
      Coordinate takeFirstTurn()
      Have the player take their first turn, and save the result so it can be completed with completeFirstTurn (This is because the first turn must happen before the map is generated - to ensure that they do not click on a mine)
      Coordinate takeTurn()
      Have the player take their turn, and apply the results to the mapInstance

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()
        Returns:
        The current turn number of the player

      • takeTurn

        public Coordinate takeTurn()
        Have the player take their turn, and apply the results to the mapInstance
        Returns:
        The coordinate the player chose

      • takeFirstTurn

        public Coordinate takeFirstTurn()
        Have the player take their first turn, and save the result so it can be completed with completeFirstTurn (This is because the first turn must happen before the map is generated - to ensure that they do not click on a mine)
        Returns:
        The coordinate the player chose

      • completeFirstTurn

        public void completeFirstTurn()
        Complete the first turn - this must be called after takeFirstTurn() and should be called after the map has been generated

        Returns:
        The player's name
